mapper.insert: insert into SYS_CONSTANT (NAME, ENNAME, STATUS) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into SYS_CONSTANT
NAME,
ENNAME,
STATUS,
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update SYS_CONSTANT
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENNAME = #{enname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where CODING = #{coding,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select
from SYS_CONSTANT where STATUS = 1 order by CODING desc
select count(0) from SYS_CONSTANT where STATUS = 1 and CODING != #{coding,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
